overview: Seven of your favorite starlets in seven brand-new scenes!  They're the hottest girls currently working in the industry: Jenna Haze, Eva Angelina, Sasha Grey, Brianna Love, Jada Fire, Rebeca Linares and Alexis Texas. Elegant Angel proudly presents a brand-new look at each one of these beauties in seven spectacular all-new scenes.  Find out why these babes are the Perfomers of the Year!
title: Performers of the Year
